description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Wander the depths of space in this gravity-based platformer.  Travel from planet to planet collecting stars to clear your path, and dodging dangerous enemies and asteroids.  Go at your own pace, but it'll take both puzzle-solving skills and quick reflexes to progress from level to level.
